title: ATL Police Officer, Mike Tyson, Peloton Tread, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: ATL Police Officer, Mike Tyson, Peloton Tread, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We runnin' a little short this morning and ain't it ironic. The Chief Love Officer explains grounds for divorce to a concerned wife. Snoop is going through it and is in need of our prayers. The officer who fatally shot Rayshard Brooks has been reinstated. Peloton's Tread and Tread-Plus machines have been recalled because of the death of a six year old child. Junior reports that Iron Mike wants to fight again and he has his eyes set on a rematch with Lennox Lewis. Our girl from The Talk updates us on her relationship with Junior. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog explains to us the mental power of the human mind!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
